snippet: Transocean, the world's largest offshore drilling contractor, has agreed to sell 38 rigs in so-called shallow water to a private equity consortium.
abstract: Transocean, the world's largest offshore drilling contractor, has agreed to sell 38 rigs in so-called shallow water to a private equity consortium.

headline.main: Transocean to Sell 38 Oil Rigs for About $1 Billion
